snippet: The writer Greg Mortenson has agreed to pay $1 million to compensate his Montana-based charity for using the group to promote and buy copies of his books.
lead_paragraph: The writer Greg Mortenson has agreed to pay $1 million to compensate his Montana-based charity for using the group to promote and buy copies of his books.

headline.seo: Greg Mortenson, ‘Three Cups of Tea’ Author, to Repay Charity
headline.main: Greg Mortenson, ‘Three Cups of Tea’ Author, to Repay Charity
